name: jillejr.newtonsoft.json-for-unity.converters
description:
This package contains converters to and from common Unity types. Types such as Vector2, Vector3, Matrix4x4, Quaternions, Color, and more.

Requires any Newtonsoft.Json of version 12.x.x to be installed. Goes hand in hand with the jillejr.newtonsoft.json-for-unity
